newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak budget deficit SKK 17.790 bln July 8-finmin.
newsitem.headline: Slovak budget deficit SKK 17.790 bln July 8-finmin.

text.p: The Slovak Finance Ministry said on Wednesday that the state budget deficit grew to 17.790 billion crowns as of July 8 from a deficit of 7.2 billion for the first five months of the year.

Marian Horvath, head of the State Assets and Liabilities Department at the ministry, told Reuters that the ministry was planning to introduce several new measures to help find cheaper funds for covering state budget deficit, which he said totalled 17.790 billion crowns as of July 8, 1997.
"We want to widen the range of investors allowed to take part in auctions of state securities," Horvath said.
The ministry is now working on a material that should allow companies, or even citizens, to buy both state bonds and treasury bills.
